column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Communicate Freely with People
#Text=Communication is the basic asset of human beings .
#Text=It 's our ability to speak and communicate freely that makes us a superior race .
#Text=But most people fail to harbor the courage to talk open minded with people they have first met or strangers in any place .
#Text=We often feel alone inside metro , buses , parks or a new institution .
#Text=Being able to approach new persons saves us from that awkward times that we often face when we do n't know anyone we are looking at .
#Text=Communication for some is like Maggie noodles ; we just need 2 minutes a top .
#Text=But , it can also become a tedious task for introverts and shy persons .
#Text=It 's very rewarding instead , if you have the guts to make the first move .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Keep your attitude right .
#Text=Your first impression is not the last impression .
#Text=When you enter a new place , say , your school or college , or even your workplace , its obvious to feel nervous .
#Text=Do n't worry so are the others .
#Text=you just need to show that you 're scared too .
#Text=They have seen you for the first time so try not to flaunt yourself , instead ; be yourself .
#Text=Think them as already your friends .
#Text=Make yourself comfortable .
#Text=Relations are not sent by God , so try to adjust in whichever seat you get .
#Text=Making access to other 's choices is also important to show you care .
#Text=You need not argue with someone for the best seat .
#Text=If you want a particular place for yourself like the front seat or the middle one then just be sure to come a little early the next day .
#Text=Making tantrums
#Text=the very first day is n't a good idea to present yourself .
#Text=Be the first to approach .
#Text=The person beside you or in front of you is seeing you for the first time .
#Text=Just act normal and introduce yourself , like " Hi , I 'm Sasha and you ? "
#Text=or focus on his/her notebook or mobile phone and say , " Good choice , its very trendy . "
#Text=You could just simply comment on his/her dress or shoes or even hairstyle .
#Text=show that you like him/her .
#Text=Sometimes there are certain common things that initiate conversation , like the classroom you are in or the boss you are working for .
#Text=Either way , feel free to voice your opinion .
#Text=Carefully listen to what others say .
#Text=Rushing with your rambling is always not a good idea ; you should also pause and listen his/her response .
#Text=Try to engage more in their topics and views .
#Text=When they find you reliable and easier to talk , you will too , find them interesting .
#Text=Do n't think for any topics beforehand .
#Text=Let the conversation lead you .
#Text=you will see one topic leads to another .
#Text=It often becomes smooth when you act natural .
#Text=Pretence is not necessary unless you did n't enroll for an acting course .
#Text=Be helpful .
#Text=Make sure to offer help when they need one .
#Text=It 's up to them to trust you or not , but you could show concern and interest in them .
#Text=Who knows , you might get help in return .
#Text=When you 're alone in a new place , you wo n't know what you need and when .
#Text=So instead of regretting later , you could just ask for some help too unless its very personal .
#Text=A helping hand once in a while saves from embarrassment .
#Text=Stay in touch after leaving .
#Text=It 's very rude to not ask for the contact number , especially after the other person has helped you .
#Text=Even if you do not intend for further communication , just an occasional ' Hi ! ' or ' Hello !
#Text=How you 're doing ? '
#Text=sums it up .
#Text=Remember the first person you met saved you from boredom and has at least been a friend to you .
#Text=Just for the sake of that , drop a message sometimes to show that you remembered .
#Text=Always be thankful .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Airing yourself is sometimes the hardest thing to do .
#Text=Even if you 're an extrovert and an expert communicator , you have to remember that people are here for your own self worth .
#Text=If you do not respect yourself , others wo n't too .
#Text=while approaching , you must be clear of who you truly are and what are you here for .
#Text=Friends and peers are always secondary .
#Text=Remember , your attitude should be right only for those who are right .
#Text=Trying to be one of them is okay but sacrificing the real you for becoming a part of something completely different is not going to buy you friends .
#Text=You will end up being a total nobody .
#Text=Choose yourself before anybody .
#Text=Confirm your base first , and try to stick to your origins .
#Text=Then make friends who suits you best .
#Text=Everyone has a unique inborn quality , make sure you do n't dump yours .
#Text=Always be honest to yourself and the others around you .
#Text=Sometimes it becomes hard to cope up with colleagues and peers , specially when they are popular .
#Text=But do n't you worry .
#Text=your day will come too .
#Text=The most important factor is your honesty , hard work and righteousness that will bear fruit .
#Text=No one has ever gone away with betrayal , treason and slyness .
#Text=The only way to stay put is to work well with others .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Do n't befriend too loud and rude people .
#Text=The best way to avoid trouble is to stay away from them .
#Text=Do n't be miserable all the time .
#Text=Feeling low and depressed is a common human behavior , but try to include in some fun too .
#Text=After all that 's the only point of communication , right ?
#Text=Granted , be rude to get rid of annoying friends .
#Text=After all , smiles ca n't conquer the world .
#Text=Do n't push yourself far enough for attention .
#Text=Just wait for the right time .
#Text=Offering for help is very charming but only if you do not get involved in their personal matters .
#Text=You do n't want controversies about yourself .
